soc.game

Class SOCRoad

  • java.lang.Object
    • soc.game.SOCPlayingPiece
      • soc.game.SOCRoutePiece
        • soc.game.SOCRoad
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class SOCRoad
extends SOCRoutePiece
    A road playing piece.

    To simplify some game code, roads and SOCShips have a common superclass.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public static final SOCResourceSet COST
        The set of resources a player needs to build a road.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SOCRoad

        public SOCRoad(SOCPlayer pl,
               int edge,
               SOCBoard board)
        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Make a new road
        Parameters:
        pl - player who owns the road
        edge - road's edge coordinate
        board - board if known; otherwise will extract from pl
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if pl null, or board null and pl.board also null
